thread.section_title: CashNowOffer Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CashNowOffer | cashnowoffer.com
thread.title: Sherry

author: Sherry
title: Sherry
text: Hands down I recommend using cashnowoffer.com when selling test strips. This was my first ever attempt doing this and I decided to take a chance once I read the reviews on the TrustPilot site. I received full payment plus the bonus amount. Make sure you follow instructions exactly and you will reap the benefits. Not only that, it is for a great cause...to help others who need test strips but cannot afford them at retail value. You can also donate older strips to the company for diabetic animals!
